Headline: #119 Michigan/119th Temporary Reroute near 119th/Wood
ShortDescription: 119 Michigan/119th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near 119th/Wood.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#119 Michigan/119th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near 119th/Wood.

Southbound buses will operate via 119th, Ashland, 115th, Vincennes, 119th, then resume their normal route.

Northbound buses will operate via 119th, Vincennes, 115th, Marshfield, 119th, then resume normal route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Clinton
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing with delays at Clinton due to a mechanical problem on a train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are stsanding with delays at Clinton due to a mechanical problem on a train.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include: 

#60 Blue Island/26th 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
